item.title: Why 'Strong Opinions Weekly Held'
item.description: Previously on this blog I wrote a short note on Why Strong Opinions Weakly Held. I’m trying to get something out every week. Hence the new blog title.

item.title: Fart Limit
item.description: Can a fart be fatal? Let’s see what science and OSHA have to say.
